segue_the_chain: Nina Simone is mentioned on the album The Score, so to this song from that album…

segue_dave.line: Nina Simone sadly died in 2003, while Kim Wilde's "You Came" was released by MCA Records, a record label which dissolved in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: Nina Simone died in 2003 and Kim Wilde's "Close" was released by MCA Records, a record label that stop existing in the same year.
